channel.title: Upcoming shows on Income Tax Refund
channel.description: Recent content in Upcoming shows on Income Tax Refund

item.title: Rắn Cạp Đuôi + syw
item.description: ITR presents: 23 July, 2024 @ TV Studio Ost doors 19h30 startttt 20h00 Rắn Cạp Đuôi (free electronic noise rock / Ho Chi Minh City) Rắn Cạp Đuôi is a collective of the Vietnamese artist Đỗ Tấn Sĩ, Phạm Thế Vũ, Zach Sch, Đỗ Hoàng Tuấn Anh, and Vuong Thien doing unexpected noise rock mayhem, glitched-out bracing DJ sets, captivating situanist performances and all that. They have released on Subtext Recordings and are part of Gãy collective from Sài Gòn.

item.title: Lemongrab + Doc FLippers + Neon Lies
item.description: ITR presents: 18.6.24 @ TV Studio Ost doors 19h30 startttt 20h02 upstairs Lemongrab (Cnd/Brln) Since their relocation from Toronto to Berlin in 2019 Lemongrab formed a new configuration which has made a quick yet lasting impression in the Berlin and wider European punk scene. Renowned for their raw and cathartic live shows and heavy but playful songwriting. IG BC YT Doc FLippers (Lpz) modern space cowboys who take us in a rocket with punky, psychedelic country music to the other side of the galaxy to drop us into a black hole.
